idCitation.resTitle: Polygon Feature Class to CAD Lines (Samples)

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Converts polygon feature classes to a CAD file with bounding lines. The coincident lines where polygons touch will be simplified to a single line. This tool has been deprecated. For more information, see An overview of the Samples toolbox.

tool.name: PolygonFeatureClasstoCADLines
tool.displayname: Polygon Feature Class to CAD Lines (Samples)
tool.summary: Converts polygon feature classes to a CAD file with bounding lines. The coincident lines where polygons touch will be simplified to a single line. This tool has been deprecated. For more information, see An overview of the Samples toolbox.

pythonReference.para: The polygon feature class that will be used to create CAD lines.

dialogReference.para: The polygon feature class that will be used to create CAD lines.

pythonReference.para: The output CAD file that contains the bounding lines from the polygon feature classes.

dialogReference.para: The output CAD file that contains the bounding lines from the polygon feature classes.

pythonReference.para: Specifies the output CAD type and version.

dialogReference.para: Specifies the output CAD type and version.

pythonReference.para: An existing CAD drawing whose contents, documents, and layer properties will be used for all new output CAD files.

dialogReference.para: An existing CAD drawing whose contents, documents, and layer properties will be used for all new output CAD files.

bullet_item.para: Output line features will be created for each input line, and polygon boundary. If input lines or polygon boundaries cross, the output lines will be split at those locations.
Multiple input features will be written to the same output CAD file.
